text:
This looks cool.
What are your plans with it?
Also any idea when it will be back online, as I want to try it out :laughing:

<@UTS5PEGF6> Hey!

I’m having one small but pretty complicated issue with Puppeteer & taking large screenshots, which is causing memory problems on Heroku. I haven’t had the bandwidth to dig into it yet, but I might try to troubleshooting it this weekend.

Honestly, I just wanted to get the idea out of my head and create a cool dev tool to show to my developer friends :laughing:. It might turn into a lead gen tool for my agency or an interactive piece for my theme customers with a call to action for the paid version—not entirely sure yet. Just wanted to express the idea in this early version!
